snippet.title: Candle Knight - TGS Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo and add Candle Knight to your Steam wishlist now! http://s.team/a/1879680/

Wield your flame to overcome menacing creatures lurking in the shadows of a ruined castle, use the dynamic difficulty system to your advantage, traverse challenging platforming sections and solve cryptic puzzles inside surreal paintings in this 2.5D action adventure platformer.


Our socials:
https://twitter.com/DracmaStudios
https://www.tiktok.com/@dracmastudios
https://www.facebook.com/dracmastudios
https://www.instagram.com/dracmastudios/

Our webpage:
https://www.dracmastudios.com/
